title: cyclic pattern
extract: Seasonality is always of a fixed and known period. Hence, seasonal time series are sometimes called periodic time series. A cyclic pattern exists when data exhibit rises and falls that are not of fixed period. The duration of these fluctuations is usually of at least 2 years.Dec 14, 2011
extract_html: Seasonality is always of a fixed and known period. Hence, seasonal time series are sometimes called periodic time series. A cyclic pattern exists when data exhibit rises and falls that are not of fixed period. The duration of these fluctuations is usually of at least 2 years.Dec 14, 2011
